description.en: First dynasty in traditional Chinese history. Legendary rulers Yu the Great and the beginnings of Chinese civilization.
description.zh: 中国历史上的第一个王朝。传说中的大禹治水，中华文明的开端。

description.en: Earliest confirmed Chinese dynasty. Bronze age, oracle bones, and ancestor worship.
description.zh: 中国最早有确切记载的王朝。青铜器时代，甲骨文，祖先崇拜。

description.en: Longest dynasty. Feudal system, Confucius, Laozi, and the Hundred Schools of Thought.
description.zh: 中国历史上持续时间最长的王朝。分封制，孔子、老子，百家争鸣。

description.en: First unified imperial dynasty. Qin Shi Huang, Great Wall, Terracotta Army, legalism.
description.zh: 中国第一个统一的帝国。秦始皇，万里长城，兵马俑，法家思想。

description.en: Golden age. Silk Road, paper invention, Confucian state, expansion, and culture.
description.zh: 中国历史上的黄金时代。丝绸之路，造纸术，儒家治国，疆域扩展与文化繁荣。

description.en: Cosmopolitan empire. Poetry, art, Buddhism, Chang'an, and international trade.
description.zh: 世界性的帝国。诗歌、艺术、佛教、长安、国际贸易。

description.en: Economic and technological advances. Printing, gunpowder, compass, and urbanization.
description.zh: 经济与科技进步。印刷术、火药、指南针、城市化。

description.en: Mongol rule. Kublai Khan, Marco Polo, and cultural exchange.
description.zh: 蒙古统治。忽必烈、马可波罗、文化交流。

description.en: Restoration of Han rule. Forbidden City, Zheng He, porcelain, and literature.
description.zh: 汉族复兴。紫禁城，郑和下西洋，瓷器，文学。

description.en: Last imperial dynasty. Manchu rule, Opium Wars, Taiping Rebellion, modernization attempts.
description.zh: 中国最后一个封建王朝。满族统治，鸦片战争，太平天国，近代化尝试。

description.en: End of imperial rule. Sun Yat-sen, warlords, Japanese invasion, civil war.
description.zh: 帝制终结。孙中山，军阀割据，日本侵略，内战。

description.en: Communist rule. Mao Zedong, economic reforms, rapid modernization, global power.
description.zh: 共产党执政。毛泽东，经济改革，快速现代化，世界强国。
